{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sitecom |model=WLR-8100 |revision=v1 - 001 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00DSA70K2;GB;, B00HC7KYIC;GB; |price=225 |est_release_date=06/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=Europe only |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-2R4E |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''Wi-Fi Router X8 AC1750''
[http://www.sitecom.com/lu/wi-fi-router-x8-ac1750/wlr-8100/p/1621 Product page] [http://www.sitecom.com/lu/persbericht-detail/231/2625 '''''Sitecom releases 802.11ac product range''''' - '''Sitecom''' press release from June 2013] [https://dev.openwrt.org/ticket/14039 Appears to be using an '''EtronTech''' EJ168A USB 3.0 controller] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=211201#p211201 Per ''snk'' on the '''OpenWrt Forums'''], this device is using QCA9880-2R4E (presumed to be a QCA9880v2).
